abstract: Amnesty International report warns that both sides in conflict in eastern Ukraine are carrying out war crimes on daily basis.
lead_paragraph: Both warring sides in eastern Ukraine are perpetrating war crimes almost daily, including torturing prisoners and summarily killing them, Amnesty International said in a report.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Ukraine: Report Finds War Crimes

snippet: Both warring sides in eastern Ukraine are perpetrating war crimes almost daily, including torturing prisoners and summarily killing them, Amnesty International said in a report.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
